projects.title: Chandome App
projects.description: Calendar app for iOS platform with intuitive interface and powerful scheduling features.
projects.keywords: chandome app, calendar app, ios app, mobile app development, scheduling app, ashkan watson project
projects.content: Alpha.com approached me as a product designer to redesign their e-commerce website and translate it into a fully mobile experience. The primary goals were to create a seamless and intuitive mobile shopping experience, optimize the design for mobile devices, and increase mobile conversions and user engagement.

projects.title: Clippy App
projects.description: AI-powered clipboard manager that enhances productivity and streamlines workflow.

projects.content: Clippy is an AI-powered clipboard manager designed to enhance productivity and streamline workflow by intelligently managing clipboard content.
